title.narrative: Circular business models: international experiences and applicability to Vietnam in fulfilling the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

description.narrative:
The overall objective of the project is reviewing legislation and policies related to CBM and making recommendations for completing legal and policy framework in order to encourage and support the development of CBM in Vietnam, thereby contributing to promoting a more sustainable development and implementation of the 2030 SDGs.
Specific objectives of the project include (i) reviewing international experiences related to CBM; (ii) reviewing Vietnam’s legal framework and policies related to CBM; (iii) evaluating the current situation of CBM application; and assessing the benefits and barriers to a business moving from linear model to CBM; (iv) providing recommendations to improve the legal and policy framework to encourage and support CBM development; and (v) raising awareness and understandings of all the relevant stakeholders (policy makers, businesses, researchers, etc.) about CBM.
